title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight add CoPilot to cockpit
description:
In this addon spotlight we will have a look at the "add CoPilot to cockpit" mod for MSFS 2020. Using this mod you will get a nice copilot in your cockpit while flying most of the airplanes. 

The current version is compatible with most airplanes except the CJ4 Longitude and the default A320Neo.

The mod can be downloaded from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/6559/add-copilot-to-cockpit
